General.Name: Vietnam Ocean Shipping JSC
General.Description: Vietnam Ocean Shipping Joint Stock Company owns, manages, and operates ships in Vietnam and internationally. The company offers chartering, and sales and purchase services, as well as related services, such as agency, freight forwarding and logistics, ship repair, lubes-oil and store supply, seafarer supply, and shipping cooperation and joint venture services. It also trades in general cargo, bulk carriers, product tankers, and container vessels. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Hai Phong, Vietnam.
